statements: SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, contact_phone FROM suppliers;
SELECT * FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_id DESC;
SELECT supplier_name FROM suppliers WHERE contact_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, contact_email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT contact_name, contact_phone, supplier_name FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE '%supplier%';
SELECT * FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT contact_email, supplier_name, contact_name FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT DISTINCT supplier_name FROM suppliers WHERE contact_phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, email, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE contact_name IS NOT NULL;
SELECT material_name, price FROM materials WHERE availability = true;
SELECT * FROM suppliers JOIN materials ON suppliers.supplier_id = materials.supplier_id WHERE suppliers.supplier_name = 'Supplier A';
SELECT supplier_name, email, phone_number, material_name, price FROM suppliers JOIN materials ON suppliers.supplier_id = materials.supplier_id WHERE materials.price > 100;
SELECT supplier_name, email, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id IN (SELECT supplier_id FROM materials WHERE availability = true);
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE contact_name IS NOT NULL ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, material_name, price FROM suppliers JOIN materials ON suppliers.supplier_id = materials.supplier_id ORDER BY price ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT material_name, unit_price FROM building_materials WHERE unit_price > 50.00;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, email FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_type, contact_value FROM suppliers s JOIN supplier_contacts c ON s.supplier_id = c.supplier_id WHERE s.supplier_id = 2;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, contact_person, email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE contact_person IS NULL;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT s.supplier_id, s.supplier_name, c.contact_type, c.contact_value FROM suppliers s INNER JOIN supplier_contacts c ON s.supplier_id = c.supplier_id;
SELECT m.material_id, m.material_name, m.unit_price, s.supplier_name FROM building_materials m INNER JOIN suppliers s ON m.supplier_id = s.supplier_id WHERE m.unit_price > 1000;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT material_name, price FROM building_materials WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT supplier_name, city, country FROM suppliers JOIN addresses ON suppliers.supplier_id = addresses.supplier_id;
SELECT supplier_name, email, phone_number FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT material_name, price FROM building_materials WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, city, country FROM suppliers WHERE country = 'USA' AND city = 'New York';
SELECT supplier_name, material_name, quantity, order_date FROM suppliers s JOIN orders o ON s.supplier_id = o.supplier_id JOIN building_materials bm ON o.material_id = bm.material_id;

SELECT supplier_name, sum(price*quantity) AS total_cost FROM suppliers s JOIN orders o ON s.supplier_id = o.supplier_id JOIN building_materials bm ON o.material_id = bm.material_id GROUP BY supplier_name ORDER BY total_cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, email, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT material_name, price FROM materials WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, city, state, country FROM suppliers JOIN addresses ON suppliers.supplier_id = addresses.supplier_id;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_price FROM orders WHERE total_price < 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC, supplier_id ASC
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT materials.material_name, materials.price, suppliers.supplier_name FROM materials INNER JOIN suppliers ON materials.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id WHERE materials.price > 1000

SELECT orders.order_id, orders.order_date, materials.material_name, payments.amount FROM orders INNER JOIN materials ON orders.material_id = materials.material_id INNER JOIN payments ON orders.order_id = payments.order_id
SELECT supplier_id, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM orders GROUP BY supplier_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
